Lord Krishna Quiz 1.question: On Janmashtami, Lord Krishna was
Lord Krishna Quiz 1.full_answer: Lord Krishna was born on Janmashtami

Lord Krishna Quiz 1.question: Janmashtami is observed in the month of
Lord Krishna Quiz 1.full_answer: Janmashtami is observed in the month of Shraavana.

Lord Krishna Quiz 1.question: Janmashtami is on which day of hindu month Shraavana ?
Lord Krishna Quiz 1.full_answer: Janmashtami is on 8th day of hindu month Shraavana.

Lord Krishna Quiz 1.question: Which Nakshatra is ascendant on Janmashtami ?
On which tithi is Janmashtami observed?
What are the dramatic enactments of the life of Krishna in Mathura and Vrindavan known as?
Lord Krishna Quiz 1.full_answer: 'Rasa Lila' is the dramatic enactments of the life of Krishna in Mathura and Vrindavan known as.

Lord Krishna Quiz 1.question: What is Janmashtami popularly known as in Mumbai and Pune?
Lord Krishna Quiz 1.full_answer: Janmashtami popularly known as 'Dahi Handi' in Mumbai and Pune.

Lord Krishna Quiz 1.question: What is Janmashtami popularly known as in Manipur?
Lord Krishna Quiz 1.full_answer: Janmashtami popularly known as 'Krishna Janma' in Manipur.

Lord Krishna Quiz 1.question: Who is known as Krishna's gopi-consort?

Lord Krishna Quiz 2.question: Who was the FATHER of Bhishma?
Lord Krishna Quiz 2.full_answer: 'Shantanu Maharaj' was the FATHER of Bhishma.

Lord Krishna Quiz 2.question: Bheem is known by which devil?
In which place did Shakuni and Duryodhan planned to kill the Pandavas and Kunti?
Lord Krishna Quiz 2.full_answer: Shakuni and Duryodhan planned to kill the Pandavas and Kunti in 'Varnawarth'.

Lord Krishna Quiz 2.question: What is the name of the Dhrupad's son that he demanded from the Brahmans?
Lord Krishna Quiz 2.full_answer: 'Dhrushtidron' is the name of the Dhrupad's son that he demanded from the Brahmans.

Lord Krishna Quiz 3.question: As a child, what would Krishna steal?
Lord Krishna Quiz 3.full_answer: As a child, Krishna steals Buttermilk

Lord Krishna Quiz 3.question: What was the name of Krishna's birth mother?
Lord Krishna Quiz 3.full_answer: 'Devaki' was the name of Krishna's birth mother.

Lord Krishna Quiz 3.question: Kanse was the King of which ancient region?
Lord Krishna Quiz 3.full_answer: Kanse was the King of Mathura.

Lord Krishna Quiz 3.question: Out of below mentioned optione which is not known as name of Krishna?
Lord Krishna Quiz 3.full_answer: Kanha, Kanhaiya is known as name of Krishna.

Lord Krishna Quiz 3.question: Who has been love of God Krishna?
what is the name of Krishna's brother?
Lord Krishna Quiz 3.full_answer: 'Balram' is the name of Krishna's brother.

Lord Krishna Quiz 3.question: Who took care or grown up Krishna as a mother?
Lord Krishna Quiz 3.full_answer: 'Yashoda' took care or grown up Krishna as a mother.

Lord Krishna Quiz 3.question: Who was the real mother of Krishna?
Lord Krishna Quiz 3.full_answer: 'Pandava' was the real mother of Krishna.

Lord Krishna Quiz 4.question: What is the color of Krishna's skin in most icons?
Lord Krishna Quiz 4.full_answer: 'blue' is the color of Krishna's skin in most icons.

Lord Krishna Quiz 4.question: What is NOT another name of Krishna?
Lord Krishna Quiz 4.full_answer: matsya, hrishikesh are another names of Krishna.

Lord Krishna Quiz 4.question: Janmashtami is celebrated on which day of month?
Lord Krishna Quiz 4.full_answer: Janmashtami is celebrated on 'Eighth day of Savana month'.

Lord Krishna Quiz 4.question: Janmashtami festival was also called as?
Lord Krishna Quiz 4.full_answer: Janmashtami festival was also called as 'Krishnashtami'.

Lord Krishna Quiz 4.question: In which month janmashtami festival will celebrate?
Lord Krishna Quiz 4.full_answer: Janmashtami festival celebrates in 'mid august to mid september'.

Lord Krishna Quiz 4.question: In which date janmashtami will celebrate?
In which place sri krishna was born?
Lord Krishna Quiz 4.full_answer: Sri krishna was born in 'prison cell'.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: With whom does Little Krishna fight to stop the terrible wind?
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: Little Krishna fight with 'Indra' to stop the terrible wind.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: What is the name of Subala's mother?
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: 'Chandrika' is the name of Subala's mother.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: Little Krishna saves a cow from the dangerous tiger.Name the cow.
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: Little Krishna saves a cow named 'Bahula' from the dangerous tiger.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: Name of the demon who tried to kill Little Krishna with poisonous milk?
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: 'Putana' (demon) tried to kill Little Krishna with poisonous milk.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: Krishna's friend who always dreams of eating sweets?
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: Krishna's friend, 'Madhu' always dreams of eating sweets.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: Biggest enemy of krishna who always plan to kill him.
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: Kams was Biggest enemy of krishna who always plan to kill him.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: Name of the monkey which is always funny in krishna's group.
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: The monkey named 'Dadil', which is always funny in krishna's group.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: Demon which tries to kill Krishna with its poison but fails to do so.
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: Demon named 'Kalia', which tries to kill Krishna with its poison but fails to do so.

Lord Krishna Quiz 5.question: Krishna loves to play which musical instrument?
Lord Krishna Quiz 5.full_answer: Krishna loves to play with Flute.

Lord Krishna Quiz 6.question: Who was the mother of Sri Krishna?
Lord Krishna Quiz 6.full_answer: Devaki was the mother of Sri Krishna.

Lord Krishna Quiz 6.question: What is the name of Krishna's brother?
Lord Krishna Quiz 6.full_answer: 'Balarama' is the name of Krishna's brother.

Lord Krishna Quiz 6.question: Lord Krishna's childhood Friend
Lord Krishna Quiz 6.full_answer: Lord Krishna's childhood Friend is Sudhama.

Lord Krishna Quiz 6.question: Little Krishna used to steal what from other houses
Lord Krishna Quiz 6.full_answer: Little Krishna used to steal 'Butter' from other houses.

Lord Krishna Quiz 6.question: What is the name of snake on which Krishna dances?
Lord Krishna Quiz 6.full_answer: 'Kalia' is the name of snake on which Krishna dances.

Lord Krishna Quiz 6.question: What is the name of the mountain which is lifted by krishna on his tip of finger?
Lord Krishna Quiz 6.full_answer: 'Govardhan' is the name of the mountain which is lifted by krishna on his tip of finger.

Lord Krishna Quiz 6.question: Name of the Demon who tried to kill Little Krishna with poisonous milk
Lord Krishna Quiz 6.full_answer: 'Putana'is the name of the Demon who tried to kill Little Krishna with poisonous milk.

Lord Krishna Quiz 6.question: Krishna loves to play which musical instrument

Lord Krishna Quiz 7.question: Which of the following is Krishna's brother?
What is the color of Krishna's skin in most icons?
Lord Krishna Quiz 7.full_answer: Blue is the color of Krishna's skin in most icons.

Lord Krishna Quiz 7.question: What is NOT another name of Krishna?
Lord Krishna Quiz 7.full_answer: Sita is NOT another name of Krishna.

Lord Krishna Quiz 7.question: Rathayatra is:
Lord Krishna Quiz 7.full_answer: Rathayatra is: festival of the chariots

Lord Krishna Quiz 7.question: Which of these descriptions doesn't apply to A.C. Bhakdivedanta Swami Srila Prabhupad?
Lord Krishna Quiz 7.full_answer: A pious devotee, The founder of ISKCON apply to A.C. Bhakdivedanta Swami Srila Prabhupad.

Lord Krishna Quiz 7.question: Who is the deity in Vrindavan?
Lord Krishna Quiz 7.full_answer: Radha Shyamsundar is the deity in Vrindavan.

Lord Krishna Quiz 8.question: what did krishna steal from other peaple's houses
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.full_answer: Krishna steals butter and milk from other people houses.

Lord Krishna Quiz 8.question: what was the name of kunses sister
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.full_answer: devki was the name of kunses sister.

Lord Krishna Quiz 8.question: why did devki ask her husband vasudev to give krishna to yashoda
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.option2: she does not want a son
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.full_answer: To protect Krishna, Devaki asked her husband vasudev to give krishna to yashoda.

Lord Krishna Quiz 8.question: why did kuns want to kill krishna
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.option2: he is a very bad boy
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.option3: because he wants to kill kuns
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.answer: because he wants to kill kuns
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.full_answer: Because Krishna wants to kill kuns

Lord Krishna Quiz 8.question: Why did lord vishnu chose to come to earth?
Lord Krishna Quiz 8.full_answer: To protect the people, lord vishnu chose to come to earth.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: At the age of ______ years Uddhava was absorbed in the service of Lord Krishna.
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: At the age of 5 years Uddhava was absorbed in the service of Lord Krishna.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: When Vidura asked about the welfare of Lord Krishna and His family and devotees, Vidura noticed that uddhava_________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.option1: Eyes were in tears due to separation from the Lord
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.option2: Had assimilated extensive love for the Lord
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: When Vidura asked about the welfare of Lord Krishna and His family and devotees, Vidura noticed that uddhava had assimilated extensive love for the Lord, Eyes were in tears due to separation from the Lord.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: Uddhava said it pained him to see Krishna__________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.option1: Standing before King Ugrasena and giving explanations to the king
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.option2: Begging pardon from His parents for His inability to serve them
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: Uddhava said it pained him to see Krishna Standing before King Ugrasena and giving explanations to the king, Begging pardon from His parents for His inability to serve them.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: Uddhava narrated the pastime of _______ to Vidura.
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.option1: Lord Krishan playing at the banks of Yamuna with His cowherd friends and calves
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.option2: Killing of various asuras sent by Kamsa
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: Uddhava narrated the pastime of Lord Krishan playing at the banks of Yamuna with His cowherd friends and calves, Killing of various asuras sent by Kamsa to Vidura.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: The last pastime of Lord Sri Krishna in Vrindavan explained by Uddhava to Vidura was_________
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: The last pastime of Lord Sri Krishna in Vrindavan explained by Uddhava to Vidura was Rasa Lila.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: The fruit vendor filled Krishna’s hands with _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: The fruit vendor filled Krishna’s hands with Fruits.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: Krishna filled the basket of the fruit vendor with_______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: Krishna filled the basket of the fruit vendor with Jewels.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: From Gokula,, Nanda Maharaja and the cowherd men moved to _______
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: From Gokula, Nanda Maharaja and the cowherd men moved to Vrndavana

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: Krishna threw the calf demon on the______ tree.
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: Krishna threw the calf demon on the Apple tree.

Lord Krishna Quiz 9.question: Bakasura demon had assumed the body of an________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 9.full_answer: Bakasura demon had assumed the body of an Duck.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: Yadava dynasty in which Krishna appeared descended from _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: Yadava dynasty in which Krishna appeared descended from Moon.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: Trivarga includes _____ where in people are religious for the sake of achieving a material position.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: Trivarga includes Dharma, Artha, Kama where in people are religious for the sake of achieving a material position.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: ______ is called bhavausadha – the remedy to stop the repetition of birth and death.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: Krishna Katha is called bhavausadha – the remedy to stop the repetition of birth and death.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: Krishna conscious is beneficial for a ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: Krishna conscious is beneficial for a Devotee, A non-devotee, A brahmana.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: Because of the vow on the verge of death , _______ had given up even drinking water.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: Because of the vow on the verge of death , Parikshit Maharaj had given up even drinking water.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: When speaking of Krishna katha _______ are purified.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: When speaking of Krishna katha The preacher, He who inquires, The people in general who listen are purified.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: Mother Earth assumed the form of a _______ and appeared before Lord Brahma and told him about her misfortune.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: Mother Earth assumed the form of a Cow and appeared before Lord Brahma and told him about her misfortune.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: Lord Brahma, Lord Shiva with all other demigods approached to the shore of the ocean of________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: Lord Brahma, Lord Shiva with all other demigods approached to the shore of the ocean of Milk.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: Everyone worshipped Lord Vishnu by reciting Vedic mantras known as the ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: Everyone worshipped Lord Vishnu by reciting Vedic mantras known as the Purusha-sukta.

Lord Krishna Quiz 10.question: While in trance Lord Brahma heard the words of ______ Vishnu.
Lord Krishna Quiz 10.full_answer: While in trance Lord Brahma heard the words of Kshirodakshayi Vishnu.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: The foremost manifestation of Krishna is _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: The foremost manifestation of Krishna is Sankarsana.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: ______ is known as Prajapati-pati.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Lord Brahma is known as Prajapati-pati.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: _____ is described as maha-bhaga for his sober and upright personality.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Vasudeva is described as maha-bhaga for his sober and upright personality.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: The incident of Krishna’s breaking of the pot of yogurt and being bound by mother Yashoda took place on ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: The incident of Krishna’s breaking of the pot of yogurt and being bound by mother Yashoda took place on Deepavali day.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: When Krishna broke the butter pot and ran, Mother Yashoda was able to trace Krishna by ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.option1: The sound of His ankle bells
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: When Krishna broke the butter pot and ran, Mother Yashoda was able to trace Krishna by his butter smeared footprints.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: Lord can be captured by a ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Lord can be captured by a Bhakta.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: When mother Yashoda was binding Krishna, she saw the binding rope was short by a distance the width of ______ fingers.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: When mother Yashoda was binding Krishna, she saw the binding rope was short by a distance the width of 2 fingers.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: The Yamala-arjuna trees in the former millennium had been the demigod sons of ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: The Yamala-arjuna trees in the former millennium had been the demigod sons of Kuvera.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: ______ cursed Nalakuvera and Manigriva to be trees.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Narada Muni cursed Nalakuvera and Manigriva to be trees.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: Deepavali is also known as ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Deepavali is also known as Dipa-maalika.

Lord Krishna Quiz 12.question: Lord Krishna is addressed as agunasya which means ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.full_answer: Lord Krishna is addressed as agunasya which means Without material qualities.

Lord Krishna Quiz 12.question: Generally everyone, including Brahma, has bodily measurement equal to ______ spans of his hand.
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.full_answer: Generally everyone, including Brahma, has bodily measurement equal to 7 spans of his hand.

Lord Krishna Quiz 12.question: By ______, Lord Brahma personally experienced that all existence, being the potency of God, is nondifferent from Him.
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.full_answer: By Lord Krishna’s mercy, Lord Brahma personally experienced that all existence, being the potency of God, is nondifferent from Him.

Lord Krishna Quiz 12.question: The Lord’s multiple identity is explained by the term ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.full_answer: The Lord’s multiple identity is explained by the term Yogeshwara.

Lord Krishna Quiz 12.question: Vaikuntha means________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.option2: Place where the Supreme Lord is seen at all times
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.option3: Place where there are no material miseries
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.answer: Place where there are no material miseries
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.full_answer: Vaikuntha means Place where there are no material miseries.

Lord Krishna Quiz 12.question: Lord Krishna’s lotus feet are described as pallava, because________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.full_answer: Lord Krishna’s lotus feet are described as pallava, because They are most tender, They are of pinkish hue, They are just like desire trees.

Lord Krishna Quiz 12.question: The activity of killing of Aghasura was celebrated on the ______ year of Lord Hari.
Lord Krishna Quiz 12.full_answer: The activity of killing of Aghasura was celebrated on the 6th year of Lord Hari.

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: When the cowherd boys fell lifeless on drinking the water of Yamuna________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.option1: The whole of Vrindavan was mourning
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.option2: Govinda brought all of them back to life by His merciful glance
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.option3: Special ayurvedic physicians arrived to take care of them
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.answer: Govinda brought all of them back to life by His merciful glance
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: Govinda brought all of them back to life by His merciful glance, then the cowherd boys fell lifeless on drinking the water of Yamuna .

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: Yamuna river was also known as _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: Yamuna river was also known as Kalindi.

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: By the poison of serpent Kaliya, the lake had turned ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.option2: Hot and its waters were boiling
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.answer: Hot and its waters were boiling
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: By the poison of serpent Kaliya, the lake had turned into 'Hot and its waters were boiling'

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: Lord Krishna jumped from the _______ tree into the Yamuna to kill Kaliya.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: Lord Krishna jumped from the Kadamba tree into the Yamuna to kill Kaliya.

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: During the fight of Krishna and Kaaliya, bad omens arouse _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: During the fight of Krishna and Kaaliya, bad omens arouse In the Sky, On the Earth and In the bodies of living creatures.

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: On seeing the inauspicious omens, the people of Vrindavan were overwhelmed with________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: On seeing the inauspicious omens, the people of Vrindavan were overwhelmed with Grief, Fear and Lamentation.

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: Lord Balarama, on seeing the distress of the residents of Vrindavan,_________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: Lord Balarama, on seeing the distress of the residents of Vrindavan, Simply smiled.

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: The wives of Kaliya were________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: The wives of Kaliya were Devotees of Krishna.

Lord Krishna Quiz 13.question: Lord Krishna saved Vrindavan by _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.option2: Allowing him to be in Yamuna but be friendly
Lord Krishna Quiz 13.full_answer: Lord Krishna saved Vrindavan by Sending him to the ocean.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: Madhupati is the name of_______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: Madhupati is the name of Krishna.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: When Krishna enters the Vrndavan forest, he has________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.option1: A peacock-feather ornament upon His head
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.option2: Blue karnikara flowers on His ears
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: When Krishna enters the Vrndavan forest, he has A peacock-feather ornament upon His head, Blue karnikara flowers on His ears, A yellow garment as brilliant as gold.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: When Krishna plays on His flute_________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.option1: Cows with their upraised ears drink the nectar of the flute-song and the calves with their mouths full of milk embrace Govinda within their hearts
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.option2: The wives of demigods’s hearts are shaken by Cupid and become bewildered
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: When Krishna plays on His flute, Cows with their upraised ears drink the nectar of the flute-song and the calves with their mouths full of milk embrace Govinda within their hearts, The wives of demigods’s hearts are shaken by Cupid and become bewildered and The doe and the bucks worship the Lord with looks of love and affection.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: The Gopis glorify The Govardhan Hill to be the best of all devotees because it provides ______ to Krishna and Balarama and to all Their friends_________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: The Gopis glorify The Govardhan Hill to be the best of all devotees because it provides Water for drinking, Caves for rest, games and Fruits, flowers and vegetables to Krishna and Balarama and to all Their friends_________.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: The gopis were born in the families of_________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: The gopis were born in the families of Vaisyas.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: When Lord Krishna reached the wrestling arena He saw ________ blocking His way.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: When Lord Krishna reached the wrestling arena He saw Kuvalyapida blocking His way.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: Lord Krishna killed Kuvalyapida and its keepers with ________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: Lord Krishna killed Kuvalyapida and its keepers with Tusk of the elephant itself.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: The people perceived Krishna and Balarama as ________ when they entered the arena.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: The people perceived Krishna and Balarama as Lightning bolt, Best of males, Cupid in person when they entered the arena.

Lord Krishna Quiz 14.question: Canura addressed Krishna and Balarama as ________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 14.full_answer: Canura addressed Krishna and Balarama as Courageous, skillful and powerful men.

Lord Krishna Quiz 15.question: The young unmarried girls of Gokula observed the vow of worshipping________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.full_answer: The young unmarried girls of Gokula observed the vow of worshipping Goddess Katyayini.

Lord Krishna Quiz 15.question: During the vow period, for the entire month the girls________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.full_answer: During the vow period, for the entire month the girls________.

Lord Krishna Quiz 15.question: This vow of the girls of Gokula was performed during the month of_________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.full_answer: This vow of the girls of Gokula was performed during the month of Margasira.

Lord Krishna Quiz 15.question: The principle prayer of the young girls was________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.option1: Let Rohini Nandan be their husband
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.option2: Let Nanda Nandan be their husband
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.option3: Let they get good kshatriya kings as their husband
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.answer: Let Nanda Nandan be their husband
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.full_answer: The principle prayer of the young girls was Let Nanda Nandan be their husband.

Lord Krishna Quiz 15.question: Lord Krishna approached the young gopis_________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.option1: Totally unaware of why the gopis had kept the vow
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.option2: Thinking if they are successful in their vow then they may defeat Him
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.option3: Fully aware of their wish and give them the perfection of their endeavor
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.answer: Fully aware of their wish and give them the perfection of their endeavor
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.full_answer: Lord Krishna approached the young gopis Fully aware of their wish and give them the perfection of their endeavor.

Lord Krishna Quiz 15.question: Krishna stole the garments of the gopis and climbed the ______ tree.
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.full_answer: Krishna stole the garments of the gopis and climbed the Kadamba tree.

Lord Krishna Quiz 15.question: When the gopis were alerted of their garments been stolen________.
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.option1: They immersed in the water completely out of shame
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.option3: Were laughing amongst themselves even in their embarrassment
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.answer: Were laughing amongst themselves even in their embarrassment
Lord Krishna Quiz 15.full_answer: When the gopis Were laughing amongst themselves even in their embarrassment and they were alerted of their garments been stolen.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: The foremost manifestation of Krishna is _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: The foremost manifestation of Krishna is Sankarsana.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: ______ is known as Prajapati-pati.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: Lord Brahma is known as Prajapati-pati.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: _____ is described as maha-bhaga for his sober and upright personality.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: Vasudeva is described as maha-bhaga for his sober and upright personality.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: The incident of Krishna’s breaking of the pot of yogurt and being bound by mother Yashoda took place on ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: The incident of Krishna’s breaking of the pot of yogurt and being bound by mother Yashoda took place on Deepavali day.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: When Krishna broke the butter pot and ran, Mother Yashoda was able to trace Krishna by ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.option1: The sound of His ankle bells
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: When Krishna broke the butter pot and ran, Mother Yashoda was able to trace Krishna by his butter smeared footprints.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: Lord can be captured by a ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: Lord can be captured by a Bhakta.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: When mother Yashoda was binding Krishna, she saw the binding rope was short by a distance the width of ______ fingers.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: When mother Yashoda was binding Krishna, she saw the binding rope was short by a distance the width of 2 fingers.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: The Yamala-arjuna trees in the former millennium had been the demigod sons of ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: The Yamala-arjuna trees in the former millennium had been the demigod sons of Kuvera.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: ______ cursed Nalakuvera and Manigriva to be trees.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: Narada Muni cursed Nalakuvera and Manigriva to be trees.

Lord Krishna Quiz 16.question: Deepavali is also known as ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 16.full_answer: Deepavali is also known as Dipa-maalika.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: The foremost manifestation of Krishna is _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: The foremost manifestation of Krishna is Sankarsana.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: ______ is known as Prajapati-pati.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: The incident of Krishna’s breaking of the pot of yogurt and being bound by mother Yashoda took place on ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: The incident of Krishna’s breaking of the pot of yogurt and being bound by mother Yashoda took place on Deepavali day.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: When Krishna broke the butter pot and ran, Mother Yashoda was able to trace Krishna by ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.option1: The sound of His ankle bells
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: When Krishna broke the butter pot and ran, Mother Yashoda was able to trace Krishna by his butter smeared footprints.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: Lord can be captured by a ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Lord can be captured by a Bhakta.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: When mother Yashoda was binding Krishna, she saw the binding rope was short by a distance the width of ______ fingers.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: When mother Yashoda was binding Krishna, she saw the binding rope was short by a distance the width of 2 fingers.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: The Yamala-arjuna trees in the former millennium had been the demigod sons of ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: The Yamala-arjuna trees in the former millennium had been the demigod sons of Kuvera.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: ______ cursed Nalakuvera and Manigriva to be trees.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Narada Muni cursed Nalakuvera and Manigriva to be trees.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: Deepavali is also known as ______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Deepavali is also known as Dipa-maalika.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: The foremost manifestation of Krishna is _______.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: The foremost manifestation of Krishna is Sankarsana.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: ______ is known as Prajapati-pati.
Lord Krishna Quiz 11.full_answer: Lord Brahma is known as Prajapati-pati.

Lord Krishna Quiz 11.question: _____ is described as maha-bhaga for his sober and upright personality.
